basic_information.scholarship_name: Emeritus Faculty Association Incoming FSI D.Sc. Scholarship

description: The Emeritus Faculty Association (EFA) is providing a one-time scholarship to a student in the inaugural class of the newly established Forensic Science Institute PhD program. Eligibility Must be an incoming Forensic Science D.Sc. student Must be enrolled full-time

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "Incoming UCO Student Qualifying Scholarship Application"
